verses.verse: וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as Moreover he made מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> miz-Bach an altar נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet, of brass עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim twenty אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits אָרְכּ֔וֹ <S%H753><s%> a-re-Ko, the length וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim thereof and twenty אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits רָחְבּ֑וֹ <S%H7341><s%> ra-che-Bo; the breadth וְעֶ֥שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> ve-'E-ser thereof and ten אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits קוֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. the height ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as Also he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea מוּצָ֑ק <S%H3332><s%> mu-Tzak; a molten עֶ֣שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser of ten בָּֽ֠אַמָּה <S%H520><s%> Ba-'am-mah cubits מִשְּׂפָת֨וֹ <S%H8193><s%> mis-se-fa-To from brim אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שְׂפָת֜וֹ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-To to brim עָג֣וֹל׀ <S%H5696><s%> a-Gol round סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, in compass וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five בָּֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah cubits קֽוֹמָת֔וֹ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To, the height וְקָו֙ <S%H6957><s%> ve-Kav thereof and a line שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim of thirty בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, cubits יָסֹ֥ב <S%H5437><s%> ya-So did compass אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. it round about

וּדְמ֣וּת <S%H1823><s%> u-de-Mut And under it [was] the similitude בְּקָרִים֩ <S%H1241><s%> be-ka-Rim of oxen תַּ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under ל֜וֹ lo סָבִ֤יב׀ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv it round about סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv round about סוֹבְבִ֣ים <S%H5437><s%> sov-Vim which did compass אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, עֶ֚שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser ten בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mah, in a cubit מַקִּיפִ֥ים <S%H5362><s%> mak-ki-Fim compassing אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam the sea סָבִ֑יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv; it all שְׁנַ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim Two טוּרִים֙ <S%H2905><s%> tu-Rim rows הַבָּקָ֔ר <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar, of oxen יְצוּקִ֖ים <S%H3332><s%> ye-tzu-Kim [were] cast בְּמֻֽצַקְתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H4166><s%> be-Mu-tzak-To. when it was cast

עוֹמֵ֞ד <S%H5975><s%> o-Med It stood עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׁנֵ֧ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten בָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar, oxen שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three פֹנִ֣ים׀ <S%H6437><s%> fo-Nim looking צָפ֡וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah toward the north וּשְׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-lo-Shah and three פֹנִ֨ים׀ <S%H6437><s%> fo-Nim looking יָ֜מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah toward the west וּשְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה׀ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-lo-Shah and three פֹּנִ֣ים <S%H6437><s%> po-Nim looking נֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah, toward the south וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-lo-Shah and three פֹּנִ֣ים <S%H6437><s%> po-Nim looking מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, toward the east וְהַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> ve-hai-Yam and the sea עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem on מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> mil-Ma-'e-lah; [was set] above וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲחֹרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H268><s%> 'a-cho-rei-Hem upon them and all their hinder parts בָּֽיְתָה׃ <S%H1004><s%> Ba-ye-tah. [were] inward

וְעָבְי֣וֹ <S%H5672><s%> ve-'a-ve-Yo And the thickness טֶ֔פַח <S%H2947><s%> Te-fach, of it [was] an handbreadth וּשְׂפָתוֹ֙ <S%H8193><s%> u-se-fa-To and the brim כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> ke-ma-'a-Seh of it like the work שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- of the brim כּ֔וֹס <S%H3563><s%> Kos, of a cup פֶּ֖רַח <S%H6525><s%> Pe-rach with flowers שֽׁוֹשַׁנָּ֑ה <S%H7799><s%> sho-shan-Nah; of lilies מַחֲזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> ma-cha-Zik [and] it received בַּתִּ֔ים <S%H1324><s%> bat-Tim, baths שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet three אֲלָפִ֖ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand יָכִֽיל׃ <S%H3557><s%> ya-Chil. and held ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as He made כִּיּוֹרִים֮ <S%H3595><s%> ki-yo-Rim lavers עֲשָׂרָה֒ <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah also ten וַ֠יִּתֵּן <S%H5414><s%> Vai-yit-ten and put חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five מִיָּמִ֜ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-ya-Min on the right hand וַחֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah and five מִשְּׂמֹאול֙ <S%H8040><s%> mis-se-mOl on the left לְרָחְצָ֣ה <S%H7364><s%> le-ra-che-Tzah to wash בָהֶ֔ם va-Hem, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh in them such things as they offered הָעוֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> ha-'o-Lah for the burnt offering יָדִ֣יחוּ <S%H1740><s%> ya-Di-chu they washed בָ֑ם Vam; וְהַיָּ֕ם <S%H3220><s%> ve-hai-Yam in them but the sea לְרָחְצָ֥ה <S%H7364><s%> le-ra-che-Tzah to wash in לַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> lak-ko-ha-Nim [was] for the priests בּֽוֹ׃ bo. ס sa-Mek

וַ֠יַּעַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Vai-ya-'as And he made אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְנֹר֧וֹת <S%H4501><s%> me-no-Rot candlesticks הַזָּהָ֛ב <S%H2091><s%> haz-za-Hav of gold עֶ֖שֶׂר <S%H6235><s%> 'E-ser ten כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <S%H4941><s%> ke-mish-pa-Tam; according to their form וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and set בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> ba-hei-Chal, [them] in the temple חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five מִיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-ya-Min on the right hand וְחָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five מִשְּׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> mis-se-Mol. on the left ס sa-Mek

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as He made שֻׁלְחָנוֹת֮ <S%H7979><s%> shul-cha-nOt tables עֲשָׂרָה֒ <S%H6235><s%> 'a-sa-Rah also ten וַיַּנַּח֙ <S%H3240><s%> vai-yan-Nach and placed בַּֽהֵיכָ֔ל <S%H1964><s%> ba-hei-Chal, [them] in the temple חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <S%H2568><s%> cha-mish-Shah five מִיָּמִ֖ין <S%H3225><s%> mi-ya-Min on the right side וַחֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-mish-Shah and five מִשְּׂמֹ֑אול <S%H8040><s%> mis-se-Mol; on the left וַיַּ֛עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he made מִזְרְקֵ֥י <S%H4219><s%> miz-re-Kei basons זָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav of gold מֵאָֽה׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah. an hundred

וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as Furthermore he made חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> cha-Tzar the court הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim, of the priests וְהָעֲזָרָ֖ה <S%H5835><s%> ve-ha-'a-za-Rah court הַגְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah; and the great וּדְלָת֧וֹת <S%H1817><s%> u-de-la-Tot and doors לָעֲזָרָ֛ה <S%H5835><s%> la-'a-za-Rah for the court וְדַלְתוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1817><s%> ve-dal-to-tei-Hem the doors צִפָּ֥ה <S%H6823><s%> tzip-Pah and overlaid נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. of them with brass

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam, the sea נָתַ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan And he set מִכֶּ֧תֶף <S%H3802><s%> mik-Ke-tef side הַיְמָנִ֛ית <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit on the right קֵ֖דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> Ke-de-mah of the east end מִמּ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> mi-Mul over against נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah. the south

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as made חוּרָ֔ם <S%H2361><s%> chu-Ram, And Huram אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַ֨סִּיר֔וֹת <S%H5518><s%> has-si-Rot, the pots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיָּעִ֖ים <S%H3257><s%> hai-ya-'Im and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּזְרָק֑וֹת <S%H4219><s%> ham-miz-ra-Kot; and the basons ס sa-Mek וַיְכַ֣ל <S%H3615><s%> vay-Chal finished; חיּרָם ch-y-ram כחוּרָ֗ם <S%H2438><s%> chu-Ram, Hiram קלַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-sOt that he was to make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, the work אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah performed לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech for king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit for the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

עַמּוּדִ֣ים <S%H5982><s%> 'am-mu-Dim pillars שְׁנַ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim, [To wit] the two וְהַגֻּלּ֧וֹת <S%H1543><s%> ve-hag-gul-Lot and the pommels וְהַכֹּתָר֛וֹת <S%H3805><s%> ve-hak-ko-ta-Rot and the chapiters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh [which were] on the top הָעַמּוּדִ֖ים <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim of the two pillars שְׁתָּ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim; and the two וְהַשְּׂבָכ֣וֹת <S%H7639><s%> ve-has-se-va-Chot wreaths שְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim, the two לְכַסּ֗וֹת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot, to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei the two גֻּלּ֣וֹת <S%H1543><s%> gul-Lot pommels הַכֹּֽתָר֔וֹת <S%H3805><s%> hak-ko-ta-Rot, of the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- were on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh which [were] on the top הָֽעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H5982><s%> Ha-'am-mu-Dim. of the pillars

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָֽרִמּוֹנִ֛ים <S%H7416><s%> ha-rim-mo-Nim pomegranates אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' And four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred לִשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Tei on the two הַשְּׂבָכ֑וֹת <S%H7639><s%> has-se-va-Chot; wreaths שְׁנַ֨יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim two טוּרִ֤ים <S%H2905><s%> tu-Rim rows רִמּוֹנִים֙ <S%H7416><s%> rim-mo-Nim of pomegranates לַשְּׂבָכָ֣ה <S%H7639><s%> las-se-va-Chah wreath הָאֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat, on each לְכַסּ֗וֹת <S%H3680><s%> le-chas-Sot, to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁתֵּי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei the two גֻּלּ֣וֹת <S%H1543><s%> gul-Lot pommels הַכֹּֽתָר֔וֹת <S%H3805><s%> hak-ko-ta-Rot, of the chapiters אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei which [were] upon הָעַמּוּדִֽים׃ <S%H5982><s%> ha-'am-mu-Dim. the pillars

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמְּכֹנ֖וֹת <S%H4350><s%> ham-me-cho-Not also bases עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; He made וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַכִּיֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3595><s%> hak-ki-yo-Rot and lavers עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah made עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַמְּכֹנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4350><s%> ham-me-cho-Not. he upon the bases

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam sea אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; One וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבָּקָ֥ר <S%H1241><s%> hab-ba-Kar oxen שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tav. under

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַ֠סִּירוֹת <S%H5518><s%> Has-si-rot The pots וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיָּעִ֤ים <S%H3257><s%> hai-ya-'Im also and the shovels וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּזְלָגוֹת֙ <S%H4207><s%> ham-miz-la-goyT and the fleshhooks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all כְּלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H3627><s%> ke-lei-Hem, and all their instruments עָשָׂ֞ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah make חוּרָ֥ם <S%H2361><s%> chu-Ram did Huram אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech to king שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh Solomon לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit for the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet brass מָרֽוּק׃ <S%H4838><s%> ma-Ruk. of bright
